definition: senior/of a senior generation/to honor/to respect/honorific/classifier for cannons and statues/ancient wine vessel
(of a cadre etc) to work for a period of time with a grassroots unit to gain firsthand experience/(dialect) taking a crap
to crouch low and bend forward (esp. in hiding or in wait)
to punish a student by having him stand in a half-squatting position with arms extended forward
Turkish toilet/squat toilet/to vacate one's bowels
to hang around keeping a watch out for sth

sentences.english: Cyndie crouches beside him on the sidewalk.
sentences.chinese: Cyndie蹲在他旁邊的人行道上。

sentences.english: Lower yourself into a half-sitting position above the toilet.
sentences.chinese: 以半坐的姿勢蹲在便池上方。

sentences.english: Place your hands on your hips and lower your butt until it's just above the seat.
sentences.chinese: 雙手放在臀部，慢慢下蹲到臀部剛好在椅子上方。

sentences.english: They ducked down behind a wall as stones began to fly.
sentences.chinese: 他們在石塊飛過來時急忙俯身蹲到一堵牆後。

sentences.english: By his side sat his faithful dog.
sentences.chinese: 在他的身旁蹲着他忠實的狗。

sentences.english: At other times this hairy man squatted by the fire with head between his legs and slept.
sentences.chinese: 有時這毛人將頭埋在兩腿之間，蹲在火邊睡覺。

sentences.english: Two stone lions, cold and aloof, stand beside in front of the gate.
sentences.chinese: 門口蹲着兩個大石獅子，嚴峻冷漠。

sentences.english: Our dog, Rex, used to sit outside our front gate and bark.
sentences.chinese: 的狗雷克斯常蹲在大門外吠叫。

sentences.english: Try push-ups, abdominal crunches and leg squats.
sentences.chinese: 試試俯臥撐，仰臥起坐和下蹲起立。

sentences.english: She bent at the knee when she skied downhill.
sentences.chinese: 她滑雪下山時曲膝下蹲。

sentences.english: If a nuclear exchange began, children were to crouch beneath their desks.
sentences.chinese: 如果美蘇開始相互核攻擊，孩子們就要蹲到課桌下面。

sentences.english: A student was jailed for claiming that cancer had killed eight village officials in Yunnan.
sentences.chinese: 一名學生因宣稱癌症導致雲南九名村官去世而蹲牢房。

sentences.english: The cat ensconced itself in the armchair.
sentences.chinese: 貓安安穩穩地蹲在扶手椅裏。

sentences.english: Short the distinctive atmosphere that couchant placement adds emperor city for the space.
sentences.chinese: 矮蹲的放置爲空間增添皇城的獨特氣氛。

sentences.english: I crouched down in the fork of the tree.
sentences.chinese: 我蹲在樹杈上，樹枝抽打着我。

sentences.english: Bend into a squat with your knees over your ankles.
sentences.chinese: 身體彎曲成下蹲姿勢，膝蓋越過踝關節。

definition: (gymnastics) to do a bridge/to do a crab
to lie on one's stomach/to lean forward, resting one's upper body (on a desktop etc)/(Tw) percent
to land/to touch the ground/also pr. [zhuo2 di4]
to crawl/to climb/to get up or sit up
to step on/to tread on/to wear (shoes)/(slang) to dump (sb)/Taiwan pr. [deng4]
